text: 313 is the number that is after 312 and before 314. == In religion == * The amount of soldiers sent by Muhammad at the Battle of Badr. * In Twelverism, 313 is the number of soldiers that Imam Mahdi will have and is sometimes stylized as ٣١٣ in the Arabic numeral system. == References == Category:Integers Category:Prime numbers
title: 313 (number)
